document_data.mainbody:
Fist Clover was a member of the Flaming Fist mercenary company from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Clover had a fair complexion with mousy-gray hair gathered in a ponytail wrapped around her head. She wore a set of leather armor as partof her Flaming Fist uniform and was armed with a deadly heavy crossbow. Clover had a flirtatious personality.
In the , Fist Clover was stationed in the Basilisk Gates barracks and prison, serving under Blaze Liara Portyr and Manip Seyama. She spent her time patrolling the barracks grounds during the Absolutist crisis.
